title: How Should They Feel?
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss how the Phillies and Padres should feel after Game 2 of the NLCS, how important Game 2 is for the Yankees and Steve Young joins the show for 5 Good Minutes.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
